response.overview: Coki, Udin, and Kunto who were patrolling were playing cards and talking about their lives. The conversation was filled with many jokes that were very typical of gentlemen's jokes. Their excitement then died down when they saw a man pushing a motorbike. They helped the man to start his motorbike. They chatted with the thief before saying goodbye. Shortly after the thief left, a husband and wife came to the patrol post panting. They reported that their house had just been burglarized.
response.title: Ronda
